definition: erhua variant of 好玩[hao3 wan2]
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

sentences.english: I heard there are many fun things here.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說這兒有很多好玩兒的東西。

sentences.english: Maybe someone did it just for fun!
sentences.chinese: 可能只是有人做的，覺得好玩兒而已。

sentences.english: Inside, Harvey's friends played many jokes on them. Kent thought it was a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 哈維的朋友們在裏面鬧洞房，肯特覺得很好玩兒。

sentences.english: "The rush" is a very interesting computer game.
sentences.chinese: 極品飛車，這是個很好玩兒的電腦遊戲。

sentences.english: Yes. Can you recommend something interesting to do?
sentences.chinese: 是的。你有什麼好玩兒的可推薦嗎？

sentences.english: Ranjan: Mmm. That's a pretty good trick.
sentences.chinese: 呣，這是個很好玩兒的把戲。
